judicialResults.label: Direction made under Section 45 of the Youth Justice and Criminal Evidence Act 1999
judicialResults.resultText:
Direction made under Section 45 of the Youth Justice and Criminal Evidence Act 1999
Name of youth Test name
Further details test wording
judicialResults.resultWording: Direction made under section 45 of the Youth Justice and Criminal Evidence Act 1999 restricting publicity in respect of youth. No matter relating to the youth may be published that would identify them, including their name, address, any educational establishment or any workplace they attend, and any picture of them. This order lasts until the youth reaches the age of 18

This order lasts during their lifetime
